prompts.name: Create Branch
prompts.description: Creates a new branch in the selected GitHub repository.
prompts.template: Create a new branch called {{branch_name}} from {{base_branch}} in {{repo_name}}

prompts.name: Create a new repository
prompts.description: Creates a new repository in the GitHub account.

prompts.name: Create a new issue
prompts.description: Creates a new issue in a GitHub repository.
prompts.template: Create a new issue in the repository {{repo_name}} with owner {{owner_name}} and issue titel as {{desc}}
